result.text:
Hey BitMart Pioneers,  

Happy 2026! As we step into a new year, we want to take a moment to share a message from our COO â€” reflecting on the progress weâ€™ve made together and the path ahead. 

ðŸ‘‡ 
Dear BitMart US Community,  

As we welcome the new year, I want to personally thank you for being part of the BitMart US community, whether you joined us this year or are just beginning to explore our platform.

Since our official launch in 2025, BitMart US has been focused on one clear mission: building a secure, compliant, and transparent digital asset trading platform designed specifically for U.S. users. From day one, our priority has been earning your trust by operating responsibly, safeguarding user assets, and meeting the highest standards of regulatory compliance.

âœ…What We Delivered in 2025
Over the past year, we made meaningful progress toward that goal:
 - Launched ACH and Wire transfers, making funding and withdrawals easier and more reliable

 - Released the BitMart US iOS app, bringing secure trading to your fingertips

 - Strengthened our security, compliance, and infrastructure, ensuring platform stability and performance

 - Introduced our Referral Program, creating new ways for users to grow and benefit together

Most importantly, BitMart US continues to offer zero trading fees, allowing you to trade freely without unnecessary costs. We believe fair, accessible, and transparent pricing should be the foundation of crypto participation in the U.S.

ðŸŽ¯ Looking Ahead to 2026
As we move into 2026, our focus remains on sustainable growth and long-term value for our users. Key priorities include:
 - Expanding Open API capabilities to better support developers and advanced traders

 - Ongoing product and infrastructure upgrades to improve speed, reliability, and user experience

 - Continued progress toward expanded U.S. regulatory coverage, enabling compliant service across all U.S. states and territories.

Everything we build is guided by a commitment to compliance, user protection, and operational excellence. Our goal is not just to grow, but to grow the right way.

Thank you for trusting BitMart US and for being part of this journey. On behalf of our entire team, I wish you a healthy, successful, and prosperous year ahead. We look forward to continuing to serve you with a secure, compliant, and zero-fee trading experience, today and in the years to come.

Sincerely,
Daniel Huang
Chief Operating Officer
BitMart US

result.text:
X wins because it has an accurate epistemology. Truth is not the product of a single authoritative process or group of people. It is evolutionary. Evolution is messy. Sometimes false information will go viral. But the truth wins in the end, and *no other process is better*. xAI will also win for the same reason: it prioritizes truth, and understands how truth is found.

Truth - the mapping between thought patterns and reality - is the true magic in this world. Align with truth and flourish, or reject it and perish.

legacy.full_text: Just this past summer, I spoke with @lexfridman about not letting AI write any code directly, but it turns out half the resistance was simply that the models weren't good enough yet! I spent more time rewriting what it wrote than if I'd done it from scratch. That has now flipped.
